title: Olivia
text: Earlier in this tutorial we made a web page with rows and columns, and it was responsive, but it did not look good on a small screen.

title: Steven
text: Media queries can help with that. We can add a breakpoint where certain parts of the design will behave differently on each side of the breakpoint.

title: Adam Hammel
text: Mobile First means designing for mobile before designing for desktop or any other device (This will make the page display faster on smaller devices).
